import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Modal from '../Utils/Modal' function ViewListBlog({blog,deletePost,}) { const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false); const handleDelete = () => { setShowModal(true); }; const isConfirm = () =>{ deletePost(blog._id) } return ( <>
Image Blog Title Description Action
{blog.title} {blog.description.slice(0, 50)}
Edit {/* Delete Modal */}
{showModal && } ) } export default ViewListBlog
